== Introduction

A mock REST API with zero coding.

The projects https://github.com/typicode/json-server[json-server] and 
https://github.com/ganmahmud/python-json-server[Python JSON Server] inspires this one.

Technologies::
* Python 3.13
* FastAPI 0.116

== Getting started

This project uses the Pipenvfootnote:pipenv[Pipenv https://pipenv.pypa.io/en/latest/]
as package manager.

=== Making requests

Check the link:docs/openapi.json[OpenAPI] description to learn how to make requests
to it.

== Contributions

```bash
pipenv install --dev
```

*`.env`* setup::
* Use `env.example` as reference
+
[source, shell]
----
include::env.example[]
----

Update the `.env` with the `APP_JSON_FILENAME` environment variable if you wanna
change de file name, e.g.:

[source, shell]
----
APP_JSON_FILENAME=my-db.json
----

Execute in dev mode::
+
[source, shell]
----
pipenv run dev
----

Access the API on http://localhost:8000[]

Tests::

+
[source, shell]
----
pipenv run tests
----
